titleStmt.title: A relation of the miraculous cure of Mrs. Lydia Hills of a lameness of seventeen or eighteen years continuance, and extraordinary pains attending it, on Saturday the 17th of November, 1694. : With her desposition of the same before the Right Honourable Sir Thomas Lane, Lord Mayor of the City of London.
titleStmt.author: Hills, Lydia, fl. ca. 1694.

titleStmt.title: A relation of the miraculous cure of Mrs. Lydia Hills of a lameness of seventeen or eighteen years continuance, and extraordinary pains attending it, on Saturday the 17th of November, 1694. : With her desposition of the same before the Right Honourable Sir Thomas Lane, Lord Mayor of the City of London.
titleStmt.author: Hills, Lydia, fl. ca. 1694.
Lane, Thomas, Sir, 1652-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Baldwin near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-Lane,
